oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Martha White - 1953-02-14 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Martha White sponsored Grand Ole Opry show from February 14, 1953. Hosted by Jud Collins.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Snow; Johnnie & Jack; Tennessee Mountain Boys; Grandpa Jones; Maybelle Carter; Carter Sisters
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (Now And Then There's) A Fool Such As I (Hank Snow) -- Jud Collins introduces Joe Marshall as a guest -- Ashes Of Love (Johnnie & Jack and The Tennessee Mountain Boys) -- Martha White commercial (Jud Collins) -- Martha White jingle -- Bald Headed End Of The Broom (Grandpa Jones) -- Wildwood Flower (Maybelle Carter, The Carter Sisters) -- Martha White commercial (Jud Collins) -- Martha White jingle -- Martha White commercial (Jud Collins)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Martha White Foods; Collins, Jud; Snow, Hank; Johnnie & Jack; Anglin, Jack, 1916-1963; Wright, Johnnie, 1914-2011; Tennessee Mountain Boys; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Carter Sisters; Carter, Anita; Carter, Helen, 1927-1998; Carter, Maybelle, 1909-1978; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; National Life & Accident Insurance Company, Inc. (Nashville, Tenn.)
